Ethnologue > Web version > Country index > Americas > Colombia > Siona

Siona

A language of Colombia

ISO 639-3: snn

Population  300 in Colombia (1982 SIL). Population total all countries: 550. Ethnic population: 734.
Region  Both sides of Putumayo River. Also in Ecuador.
Language map  Southern Colombia
Alternate names   Sioni, Pioje, Pioche-Sioni, Ganteyabain, Ganteya, Ceona, Zeona, Koka, Kanú
Classification  Tucanoan, Western Tucanoan, Northern, Siona-Secoya
Language development  Literacy rate in L1: 5%–10%. Literacy rate in L2: 15%–25%. NT: 1982.
Writing system  Latin script.
Comments  Those in Ecuador consider themselves Colombians. Distinct from Secoya (Siona-Secoya). SOV. Swidden agriculturalists.

Also spoken in:

Ecuador

Language name   Siona
Population  250 in Ecuador (2000 Juncosa).
Region  Putumayo River.
Language map  Ecuador, reference number 18
Comments  Distinct from Secoya [sey] (Siona-Secoya). Swidden agriculturalists.
 

Entries from the SIL Bibliography about this language:

Academic Publications

Elson, Benjamin F., editor. 1962. Studies in Ecuadorian Indian languages 1.  

Mountain, Kathy. 1978. "Lista de palabras Swadesh y Rowe."  

Peeke, M. Catherine, editor. 1975. Estudios fonológicos de lenguas vernáculas del Ecuador.

Schauer, Stanley and others. 1973. Aspectos de la cultura material de grupos étnicos de Colombia 1.  

Wheeler, Alva and Margaret A. Wheeler. 1962. "Siona phonemics (Western Tucanoan)."  

Wheeler, Alva and Margaret A. Wheeler. 1975. "Fonémica siona (Tucano occidental)."

Wheeler, Alva, compiler. 1987. Gantëya bain (El pueblo siona del río Putumayo, Colombia).  

Wheeler, Alva. 1962. "A Siona text morphologically analyzed."  

Wheeler, Alva. 1967. "Grammatical structure in Siona discourse."

Wheeler, Alva. 1970. Grammar of the Siona language, Colombia, South America.  

Wheeler, Alva. 1973. "Siona."  

Wheeler, Alva. 2000. "La lengua siona."

Wheeler, Margaret A. 1970. "Siona use of chambira palm fiber."

Yaiguaje, Estanislao, Alva Wheeler, and Margaret A. Wheeler. 1974. "Texto siona: En el principio."  

Vernacular Publications

Airu huaʼi huaʼna 6. 1969.

Cartilla siona 1-4. 1962.

Cuya coca 5. 1969.

Gantëya bain 8. 1969.

Pedro y el lobo; El alacrán y la charapa: Cartilla siona 7. 1969.

Una collección de narraciónes indígenas. 1976.
